specifications.Dye Method: Space Dye Space dye is a technique where yarns are dyed with multiple colors at intervals along their length irregularly. This creates a unique multi-colored effect within a single yarn, resulting in fabrics with rich, variegated color patterns. Appearance > Crinkled
specifications.Care Advice: Regenerated > Viscose Rayon This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
